positions.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
positions.description:
• Full-Stack Development with a Frontend Focus: Specializing in building and optimizing full-stack solutions, strongly emphasizing frontend development. My key technologies include React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Astro, Node.js, and Solid.js.
  • Teacher Platform Revamp: Led the enhancement of the Teacher Platform by leveraging Context API and Zustand, improving state management, performance, and user experience.
  • Student Platform Development: Collaborated closely with the team to design and build a seamless student platform tailored to user needs.
  • Reading Match Platform Refactor: Refactored and rebuilt the children's book reading and highlighting platform, significantly improving code quality, performance, and scalability.
  • Performance & Scalability Optimization: Focused on enhancing speed, scalability, and maintainability, ensuring a robust user experience and high-quality code.
  • Admin Panel Development: Built a role-based, passwordless admin panel that allows employees to efficiently manage schools and students. Developed using Next.js, React.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
